channel.title: Sipp on Leif Madsen.
channel.description: Recent content in Sipp on Leif Madsen.

item.title: Load testing SIP registrations with SIPp
item.description: Today I had a need to go and load a bunch of registrations into Asterisk for a bug I was working on. Since I’ve had this need a couple of times now, and I keep going and having to redevelop it, I think I’ll just write about it here, and then when I need it again, I can just look it up. Maybe this will be useful for someone else as well.
